valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low England 1000 moves quickly eastwards and loses its identity by 1800 Sunday. New low expected Biscay 1015 by same time

Squally showers.

Moderate or good.
